verbs.description: [V: astros] manager aj hinch bumps alex bregman to the leadoff spot for alcs game 4 alex bregman is in the leadoff spot for the houston astros in game 4 of the al championship series against the boston red sox after batting third houston astros jose altuve houston boston red sox alex bregman a j hinch aj hinch josé altuve astros
